name: 小白的新衣 / Snower's New Clothes
name_original: 小白的新衣 / Snower's New Clothes
description:
Snower is a sexy big girl，She likes to wear all kinds of sexy clothes.
In order to get the clothes you like, Xiaobai needs to face various challenges. There may also
be unexpected unexpected situations.
A total of five parts of clothing can be collected, including bras, panties, tops, skirts and hairstyles.
The three challenges are to push the box, avoid the enemy, and walk the maze.
Players can get these clothes as long as they are challenged.
This is suitable for players who like to challenge themselves.
features：
Complex dressing system
Characteristic challenge
